h2.div: Welcome to the Holmdel Township Schools

span.span: On behalf of our school district, it is my privilege to welcome you to our district website, a visual representation of our efforts to innovate to elevate in all that we do.

Throughout the pages of this website, you will find evidence of our school district's "commitment to excellence." Here, and throughout our schools, you will see a vibrant student community in which children and young people are at the center of all that we do and where they, and our passionate and highly-skilled staff and committed, engaged and motivated parents and families, partner to produce superior results for all.
Thank you for visiting and exploring our site -
Click here to read Dr. McGarry's latest report to the Board of Education

div.div: Click the images above to follow our "2020" progress!
